hadiths.text: Narrated AbudDarda': The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would sit and we would also sit around him. If he got up intending to return, he would take off his sandals or something he was wearing, and his Companions recognising his purpose (that he would return) would stay where they were

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا قَامَ مِنْ مَجْلِسٍ ثُمَّ رَجَعَ
chapter.eng-name: If a person gets up from his seat then returns
